code: import dangerousStyleValue from"./dangerousStyleValue";function setValueForStyles(node,styles){var style=node.style;for(var styleName in styles){if(!styles.hasOwnProperty(styleName)){continue;}var isCustomProperty=styleName.indexOf('--')===0;var styleValue=dangerousStyleValue(styleName,styles[styleName],isCustomProperty);if(styleName==='float'){styleName='cssFloat';}if(isCustomProperty){style.setProperty(styleName,styleValue);}else{style[styleName]=styleValue;}}}export default setValueForStyles;
